# Security Policy

## Reporting a Vulnerability

If you discover a security vulnerability in CommuCore, please report it responsibly.

**Do not open a public issue.**

Instead, contact:

security@commu-core.org

Please include:

- A detailed description of the vulnerability
- Steps to reproduce (if possible)
- Affected versions
- Any relevant logs or screenshots

---

## Supported Versions

Only the latest stable version is actively supported with security updates.

---

## Responsible Disclosure

We appreciate responsible disclosure and will work to address issues as quickly as possible.

Thank you for helping keep CommuCore secure.
